languages.text: "Не-е-ет!!" {n}Истошный вопль Идиры сотрясает стены. Женщина падает на колени, вздрагивая от рыданий.{/n} "Я... я не слышала, Лорд-капитан! Ничего не слышала! Ни шепотка, ни вздоха! Там было... было так громко! Почему я не предвидела?!"

traits.locale_text: "Не-е-ет!!" {n}Истошный вопль Идиры сотрясает стены. Женщина падает на колени, вздрагивая от рыданий.{/n} "Я... я не слышала, Лорд-капитан! Ничего не слышала! Ни шепотка, ни вздоха! Там было... было так громко! Почему я не предвидела?!"

languages.text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"
languages.original_text: "Не-е-ет!!" {n}Истошный вопль Идиры сотрясает стены. Женщина падает на колени, вздрагивая от рыданий.{/n} "Я... я не слышала, Лорд-капитан! Ничего не слышала! Ни шепотка, ни вздоха! Там было... было так громко! Почему я не предвидела?!"

traits.locale_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud there! Why didn't I foresee this?"

"NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud there! Why didn't I foresee this?"

"NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

"NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

languages.text: “不——！！”{n}伊迪拉撕心裂肺地尖叫起来，整个船舱仿佛都在摇晃。她跪倒在地，身体颤抖着，嚎啕大哭。{/n}“我……舰长大人，我没听到！我什么都没听到！就连低语声和呼吸声都没有！那声音……明明这么响亮！可我为什么没有预见到这件事情？”
languages.original_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

traits.locale_text: “不——！！”{n}伊迪拉撕心裂肺地尖叫起来，整个船舱仿佛都在摇晃。她跪倒在地，身体颤抖着，嚎啕大哭。{/n}“我……舰长大人，我没听到！我什么都没听到！就连低语声和呼吸声都没有！那声音……明明这么响亮！可我为什么没有预见到这件事情？”

languages.text: «¡NOOO!». {n}El desgarrador grito de Idira hace temblar las paredes. Cae de rodillas, temblando y llorando.{/n} «Yo... ¡Lord Capitán, no lo oí! ¡No oí nada! ¡Ni un susurro, ni un soplo! Ha sido... ¡Ha sido tan ruidoso! ¿Cómo no lo he podido prever?».
languages.original_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

traits.locale_text: «¡NOOO!». {n}El desgarrador grito de Idira hace temblar las paredes. Cae de rodillas, temblando y llorando.{/n} «Yo... ¡Lord Capitán, no lo oí! ¡No oí nada! ¡Ni un susurro, ni un soplo! Ha sido... ¡Ha sido tan ruidoso! ¿Cómo no lo he podido prever?».

languages.text: 「いやー！」{n}イディラの悲痛な叫びが壁を揺らす。彼女は膝から崩れ落ち、体を震わせて泣く。{/n}「私は…ロード・キャプテン、聞こえませんでした！何も聞こえませんでした！ささやき声も、息づかいも！それは…とてもうるさかった！私はどうしてこれを予見できなかったの？」
languages.original_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

traits.locale_text: 「いやー！」{n}イディラの悲痛な叫びが壁を揺らす。彼女は膝から崩れ落ち、体を震わせて泣く。{/n}「私は…ロード・キャプテン、聞こえませんでした！何も聞こえませんでした！ささやき声も、息づかいも！それは…とてもうるさかった！私はどうしてこれを予見できなかったの？」
「いやー！」{n}イディラの悲痛な叫びが壁を揺らす。彼女は膝から崩れ落ち、体を震わせて泣く。{/n}「私は…ロード・キャプテン、聞こえませんでした！何も聞こえませんでした！ささやき声も、息づかいも！それは…とてもうるさかった！私はどうしてこれを予見できなかったの？」

languages.text: « NOOON ! » {n}Le hurlement déchirant d'Idira fait trembler les murs. Elle s'effondre à genoux et se met à sangloter.{/n} « Je... Seigneure-capitaine, je n'ai pas entendu ! Je n'ai rien entendu du tout ! Pas un murmure, pas un souffle ! Il y avait... un tel vacarme ! Pourquoi est-ce que je n'ai rien vu de tout ça ? »
languages.original_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

traits.locale_text: « NOOON ! » {n}Le hurlement déchirant d'Idira fait trembler les murs. Elle s'effondre à genoux et se met à sangloter.{/n} « Je... Seigneure-capitaine, je n'ai pas entendu ! Je n'ai rien entendu du tout ! Pas un murmure, pas un souffle ! Il y avait... un tel vacarme ! Pourquoi est-ce que je n'ai rien vu de tout ça ? »

languages.text: "NEEEIN!" {n}Idiras herzzerreißender Schrei lässt die Wände erzittern. Sie sinkt auf die Knie, ihr Körper zuckt, als sie weint.{/n} "Ich ... Lord Captain, ich habe nichts gehört! Überhaupt nichts! Kein Flüstern, kein Atmen! Es war ... Es war so laut! Warum habe ich es nicht vorhergesehen?"
languages.original_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

traits.locale_text: "NEEEIN!" {n}Idiras herzzerreißender Schrei lässt die Wände erzittern. Sie sinkt auf die Knie, ihr Körper zuckt, als sie weint.{/n} "Ich ... Lord Captain, ich habe nichts gehört! Überhaupt nichts! Kein Flüstern, kein Atmen! Es war ... Es war so laut! Warum habe ich es nicht vorhergesehen?"

languages.original_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

languages.text: "HAYIR!" {n}İdira'nın yürek burkan feryadı duvarları sarsıyor. Dizleri üstüne yığılıp gözyaşlarına boğulurken bedeni titriyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Duymadım! Duyamadım! Ne bir fısıltı ne bir nefes! Bas bas bağırıyormuş! Sağır mı oldum? Nasıl öngöremem?"
languages.original_text: "NOOO!" {n}Idira's heart-rending scream shakes the walls. She collapses to her knees, her body shuddering as she weeps.{/n} "I... Lord Captain, I didn't hear! Didn't hear a thing! Not a whisper, not a breath! It was... It was so loud! Why didn't I foresee this?"

traits.locale_text: "HAYIR!" {n}İdira'nın yürek burkan feryadı duvarları sarsıyor. Dizleri üstüne yığılıp gözyaşlarına boğulurken bedeni titriyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Duymadım! Duyamadım! Ne bir fısıltı ne bir nefes! Bas bas bağırıyormuş! Sağır mı oldum? Nasıl öngöremem?"
